title: Veiled
description: Jenny has always wanted a fairytale life: the perfect house, her own Prince Charming and the wedding to go with it.After a five year engagement Jenny and her fiance Rich are counting down to the "Big Day"... And lets not forget one hell of a Hen Party For Jenny her life as the perfect wife is all she has ever wanted but secrets are never far away... Will Jenny make it to her own fairytale wedding... All will be revealed in "Veiled"
author: L.  Chapman
